title: Clustering Validation with The Area Under Precision-Recall Curves. (arXiv:2304.01450v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Confusion matrices and derived metrics provide a comprehensive framework for the evaluation of model performance in machine learning. These are well-known and extensively employed in the supervised learning domain, particularly classification. Surprisingly, such a framework has not been fully explored in the context of clustering validation. Indeed, just recently such a gap has been bridged with the introduction of the Area Under the ROC Curve for Clustering (AUCC), an internal/relative Clustering Validation Index (CVI) that allows for clustering validation in real application scenarios. In this work we explore the Area Under Precision-Recall Curve (and related metrics) in the context of clustering validation. We show that these are not only appropriate as CVIs, but should also be preferred in the presence of cluster imbalance. translated_abstract: 混淆矩阵及其衍生指标为机器学习中模型表现评估提供了一个全面的框架。这些在监督学习领域中的应用非常广泛，特别是在分类中。然而，针对聚类验证，这样的框架却没有被充分地探索。最近，AUCC（聚类的ROC曲线下面积）的引入弥补了这一空白，它是一种内部/相对的聚类验证指数，允许在实际应用场景中进行聚类验证。在这项工作中，我们探索了Precision-Recall曲线下面积（以及相关指标）在聚类验证中的应用。我们表明，这不仅是适合作为聚类验证指数，而且在存在类别失衡问题时应该被优先选择。我们对提出的和最先进的聚类验证指数在真实和模拟数据集上进行了全面的评估。我们的观察结果为实现关于统一聚类验证指数的目标提供了支持。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种新的聚类验证指数，即Precision-Recall曲线下面积，在存在类别不平衡的情况下应该被优先选择。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a novel clustering validation index, the Area Under Precision-Recall Curve, that should be preferred over others in the presence of cluster imbalance.
